org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.storage.sql
Class AeJNDIDataSource

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.storage.sql.AeDataSource
      org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.storage.sql.AeJNDIDataSource
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.sql.DataSource
public class AeJNDIDataSource
extends AeDataSource

Implements a JNDI version of an AeDataSource. This implementation uses JNDI to look up the configured data source with the given JNDI name.

Constructor Detail

AeJNDIDataSource

public AeJNDIDataSource(java.util.Map aConfig,
                        AeSQLConfig aSQLConfig)
                 throws AeException
Constructs a JNDI data source. Uses information in the engine configuration map to initialize its state (JNDI name, username, password).

Parameters:
aConfig - The engine configuration map for this data source.
aSQLConfig - The SQL configuration.
